p: The methanolic extracts of seven Lavandulae species ( L. stoechas, L. lanata, L. viridis, L. angustifolia „Rosea”, L. angustifolia „Afropurpurea”, L. angustifolia and one unknown) were analyzed using RP-HPLC–DAD gradient elution technique to obtain the chromatographic fingerprint profiles. The chromatographic data were processed using the SpecAlign program.
